[L. A. No. 15691. In Bank. September 4, 1936.] In the Matter of the Estate of GEORGE H. KEMBALL, Deceased. EVERETT W. MATTOON et al., Appellants, v. VIOLET MANDE KEMBALL et al., Respondents. In the Matter of the Estate of STELLA B. BOULTER, Deceased. EVERETT W. MATTOON et al., Appellants, v. EDITH McCAULEY et al., Respondents.
